title: Euler-type recurrences for $t$-color and $t$-regular partition functions
authors: Tapas Bhowmik, Wei-Lun Tsai, Dongxi Ye
abstract:
We give Euler-like recursive formulas for the $t$-colored partition function
when $t=2$ or $t=3,$ as well as for all $t$-regular partition functions. In
particular, we derive an infinite family of ``triangular number" recurrences
for the $3$-colored partition function. Our proofs are inspired by the recent
work of Gomez, Ono, Saad, and Singh on the ordinary partition function and make
extensive use of $q$-series identities for $(q;q)_{\infty}$ and
$(q;q)_{\infty}^3.$
